mapper.select: select * from ( select gdsNum, gdsName, gdsPrice, gdsThumbImg, gdsSale, gdsStock from goods order by gdsSell desc) where rownum <= 8
select * from ( select gdsNum, gdsName, gdsPrice, gdsThumbImg, gdsSale, gdsStock from goods order by gdsDate desc) where rownum <= 8
select g.gdsNum, g.gdsName, g.gdsPrice, g.gdsThumbImg, c.cartNum, c.userId, c.cartStock from cart c inner join goods g on c.gdsnum = g.gdsnum where c.userId = #{gdsNum} order by cartNum asc
mapper.insert: insert into orders(orderId, userId, orderRec, addr1, addr2, addr3, orderPhone, amount) values(#{orderId}, #{userId}, #{orderRec}, #{addr1}, #{addr2}, #{addr3}, #{orderPhone}, #{amount})
insert into orders_detail(orderDetailsNum, orderId, gdsNum, cartStock) select order_detail_seq.nextval, #{orderId}, gdsNum, cartStock from cart
mapper.select: select o.orderId, o.userId, o.orderRec, o.Addr1, o.Addr2, o.Addr3, o.orderPhone, o.amount, o.orderDate, o.status, d.orderDetailsNum, d.gdsNum, d.cartStock, g.gdsName, g.gdsThumbImg, g.gdsPrice from orders o inner join orders_detail d on o.orderId = d.orderId inner join goods g on d.gdsNum = g.gdsNum where o.userId = #{userId} and o.orderId = #{orderId}
mapper.insert: insert into reply ( gdsNum, userId, repNum, repCon) values ( #{gdsNum}, #{userId}, reply_seq.nextval, #{repCon})
